thread.title: Asin to marry in Delhi on November 26
thread.title_full: Asin to marry in Delhi on November 26 - The Times of India

author: Divya Kaushik
title: Asin to marry in Delhi on November 26
text:
Asin and Delhi-based entrepreneur Rahul Sharma's wedding will take place on November 26 at a hotel on NH8 in Delhi, a source tells us.
The wedding will be a "private and closely guarded" affair with only the couple's close friends and family. The couple will also host a reception on November 27 at a private farmhouse at West End Greens, the place where Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput also got married.
READ: BT Exclusive: I will get married to Rahul by the end of the year: Asin
The celebrations will continue in Mumbai as Asin is expected to host a reception in the city on either November 28 or 29 (date not finalised yet). Preparations for the wedding have already started with the couple's active participation.
Delhi Wedding - November 26
Delhi Reception - November 27
Mumbai Reception - November 28 or 29
